Uses of Class
com.gemstone.gemfire.cache.operations.OperationContext.OperationCode

  • Packages that use OperationContext.OperationCode 
    Package Description
    com.gemstone.gemfire.cache.operations
    Contains the OperationContext interface that encapsulates an operation and the data associated with it for both the pre-operation and post-operation cases.

    • Uses of OperationContext.OperationCode in com.gemstone.gemfire.cache.operations
